title: Sherlock Holmes and the Flying Zombie Death Monkeys
description: Legendary detective Sherlock Holmes is forced to deal with a plague that threatens to engulf the whole country. Victorian London is besieged by a new and terrible kind of creature. Dripping with carnage, mayhem, and some of the worst haircuts in recorded history, see how the great sleuth defies death and deals it out. Will Watson avenge the cat? And can Victorian life ever recover ..."I may be wrong about this, but I think you've really got something with this Sherlock character of yours...Solving crimes, playing the violin, that schlubby Watson - where the hell did you get this idea?"Michael Gerber, author, Barry Trotter and the Shameless Parody
author: Chris   Wood
